name: analyze-calcium-imaging-data
title: Analyze Calcium Imaging Data
description: Quantify neuronal activity metrics from calcium imaging microscopy data
content:
Overview

This application analyzes calcium imaging data to quantify neuronal activity. Built using Biomni, it processes fluorescence microscopy images of GCaMP-labeled neurons to extract event rates, decay times, and signal-to-noise ratios.

Features

  • Automated neuron segmentation using watershed
  • Time-series fluorescence extraction
  • Calcium event detection and quantification
  • Decay time constant calculation
  • Signal-to-noise ratio analysis

Parameters

  • Image Stack Path: Path to time-series TIFF stack of calcium imaging data
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates CSV files with neuron activity metrics and time-series data for each detected neuron.

Use Cases

  • Neuronal activity analysis
  • GCaMP calcium imaging studies
  • Network activity quantification
  • Drug response screening
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/biomni/bioengineering/analyze_calcium_imaging_data.py" "${imageStackPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
